posts.author: campgod
posts.content: Ok, I am stuck on the Barbarian build thing right now... What about a Dex Barbarian/SD/Monk build? One that has a high DC terrifying rage and with epic dodge? I looked and didn't see one, is there a reason for that? I think it would be a cool build, no? mostly for PvP, lvl 40. I don't care if its playable 1-40 just good at lvl 40. HiPS, high DC on rage....that would be cool. unarmed attack? I can get +12 stats due to crafting items on the server I play on. Around 4 diff. +12 stats if need be. So cloth armor, I can bump up the AC with wisdom? Would also like to be able to hit things lol.Any ideas? As always, Thanks for your time and wisdom!

posts.author: Valerfor
posts.content:
You could not possibly see it without searching all those builds we have here, and unfortunately we do not have a search engine yet but my memory helped me

Tiny Slick Berserker, by Maximillian Kane => tiny-slick-berserker-barbarian-15-rogue-19-fighter-6-t2329594.html


Has Epic Dodge, pretty good AB especially if you consider he has 19 Rogue lvls, ESF: Intimidate & Terrifying Rage of course, bonus is the EWS in Kukris

The Barbarian/ SD/ Monk would have a lower AB amongst other problems (such as alignment changes).

posts.author: campgod
posts.content: Thank you Valerfor, I'll give it a run and see how I like it. I was thinking SD just because of the HiPS but yeah the AB would be really low.
